about_the_game:
Color Odyssey in a platformer where you can swap between 4 colorful worlds. At the start of the game, access is limited to a white, empty world. During your adventure, you collect Spirits that allow you to visit the Red, Green, Yellow and Blue worlds. You can alternate between them on the fly, in a very dynamic gameplay.
Some objects and platforms are exclusive to a certain world. Steam machines can only be powered by the heat of the Red world. Wood trampolines only activate in the Green world, and so on.

21 Levels, each alternating between 4 worlds.
Collectibles! Wisps and Fragments are scattered across the worlds.
Intuitive controls: you move, jump, wall jump and change the world around you with the click of a button.
Auto-saving: you progress is saved automatically in a profile.
Extra ending unlocked at 100% completion.

PHOTOSENSITIVE WARNING: READ BEFORE PLAYING!
A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a computer screen, or while playing video games, may induce an epileptic seizure in these individuals. Certain conditions may induce previously undetected epileptic symptoms even in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy.
If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing. If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing a video or computer game -- dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions -- IMMEDIATELY discontinue use and consult your physician before resuming play.
detailed_description:
Color Odyssey in a platformer where you can swap between 4 colorful worlds. At the start of the game, access is limited to a white, empty world. During your adventure, you collect Spirits that allow you to visit the Red, Green, Yellow and Blue worlds. You can alternate between them on the fly, in a very dynamic gameplay.
Some objects and platforms are exclusive to a certain world. Steam machines can only be powered by the heat of the Red world. Wood trampolines only activate in the Green world, and so on.

21 Levels, each alternating between 4 worlds.
Collectibles! Wisps and Fragments are scattered across the worlds.
Intuitive controls: you move, jump, wall jump and change the world around you with the click of a button.
Auto-saving: you progress is saved automatically in a profile.
Extra ending unlocked at 100% completion.

PHOTOSENSITIVE WARNING: READ BEFORE PLAYING!
A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a computer screen, or while playing video games, may induce an epileptic seizure in these individuals. Certain conditions may induce previously undetected epileptic symptoms even in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy.
If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing. If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing a video or computer game -- dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions -- IMMEDIATELY discontinue use and consult your physician before resuming play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 or compatible
  • Storage: 415 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i3-3210, AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent.
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or compatible
  • Storage: 415 MB available space

name: Color Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 415 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-3210, AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent.
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 415 MB available space

short_description: Color Odyssey is a 3D platformer game, where you have to swap between 4 worlds to proceed, using your ingenuity and skill. You play as Gloria, a girl that lived in a blank, lifeless world, in her adventure to discover 4 colorful new ones!
